body:
RFM (race for monument) is basically a game of nebula with 2 or more teams. There is a monument in the very middle of the map, and the teams have to try to destroy the only monument.

(Optional)There can be (a) monument(s) at your own side, when it is destroyed you lose or don't respawn or something like that. 

Sorry if this was already suggested.

title: New gamemode: RFM

replies.body:
Oh, honey...

This has been round for like 4 months now except it's not exactly the same as you mentioned. It's survival nebula with monuments and TNT similar to race for wool.

replies.body: I made an OCN map with this concept like 6 months ago but we couldn't figure out the XML for it ;-;
